problems.title: Palindrome Check
problems.description: Check whether the given string is a palindrome or not.
problems.output_format: Return true if s is a palindrome, else false

problems.title: Output of Python Code
problems.description:
What is the output of:

```python
print(2 ** 3 ** 2)
```

problems.title: Find Missing Number
problems.description: Given an array of n-1 integers in the range from 1 to n, find the missing number.
problems.output_format: An integer representing the missing number
